Ru_trainchinese: rǔ: (местоим) ты, твой (используется в обращении к собеседнику)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the woman (女) gives the water (氵) to thou
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle starts with " water " and " female ", the original meaning is a person's name. " Ru " in the bronze inscriptions is written as " female ", see " female ", which was later used as the name of the water, "Shu Wen": "Ru, water. The Lu family from Hongnong returns to the mountain, east into the Huai. From the water female voice." Zuo Zhuan·Seventeen Years of Chenggong": "The son of Chu Shen saves Zheng, and he learned from Ru." " Ru " is also used as a place name, "Guangyun. "Yu Yun": "Ru, the name of Yizhou. It was the land of Wang Ji and Zheng Chu in the Spring and Autumn Period."

Later generations " ru " borrowed as the second person pronoun, "Zhengzitong. Ministry of Water: "Ru, the name of the water, borrowed as Erru." "Book. Yao Dian": "You can be mediocre, Sunda is my position." Song Dynasty Lu You's poem "Zhancheng South": "Xu Ru in the imperial edict is immortal, why is the chestnut like sweat".
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle starts with " water " and " female ", and its original meaning is a person's name.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「水」，「女」聲，本義為人名。金文「汝」皆寫作「女」，參見「女」，後用作水名，《說文》：「汝，水。出弘農盧氏還歸山，東入淮。从水女聲。」《左傳·成公十七年》：「楚公子申救鄭，師於汝上。」「汝」亦用作地名，《廣韻．語韻》：「汝，亦州名。春秋時為王畿及鄭楚之地。」

　　後世「汝」借用為第二人稱代詞，《正字通．水部》：「汝，本水名，借為爾汝字。」《書．堯典》：「汝能庸命，巽朕位」。宋代陸游詩〈戰城南〉：「詔書許汝以不死，股栗何為汗如洗」。
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「水」，「女」聲，本義為人名。

Kanshudo mnemonic:the woman (女) gives the water (氵) to thou

甲骨文從「 水 」，「 女 」聲，本義為人名。金文「 汝 」皆寫作「 女 」，參見「 女 」，後用作水名，《說文》：「汝，水。出弘農盧氏還歸山，東入淮。从水女聲。」《左傳·成公十七年》：「楚公子申救鄭，師於汝上。」「 汝 」亦用作地名，《廣韻．語韻》：「汝，亦州名。春秋時為王畿及鄭楚之地。」 後世「 汝 」借用為第二人稱代詞，《正字通．水部》：「汝，本水名，借為爾汝字。」《書．堯典》：「汝能庸命，巽朕位」。宋代陸游詩〈戰城南〉：「詔書許汝以不死，股栗何為汗如洗」。
Oracle starts with " water" and " female", the original meaning is a person's name. " Ru" in the bronze inscriptions is written as " female", see " female", which was later used as the name of the water, "Shu Wen": "Ru, water. The Lu family from Hongnong returns to the mountain, east into the Huai. From the water female voice." Zuo Zhuan·Seventeen Years of Chenggong": "The son of Chu Shen saves Zheng, and he learned from Ru." " Ru" is also used as a place name, "Guangyun. "Yu Yun": "Ru, the name of Yizhou. It was the land of Wang Ji and Zheng Chu in the Spring and Autumn Period." Later generations " ru" borrowed as the second person pronoun, "Zhengzitong. Ministry of Water: "Ru, the name of the water, borrowed as Erru." "Book. Yao Dian": "You can be mediocre, Sunda is my position." Song Dynasty Lu You's poem "Zhancheng South": "Xu Ru in the imperial edict is immortal, why is the chestnut like sweat".

汝字的基本解释

汝
rǔ
你：汝辈。汝等。汝曹。汝将何经。
姓。

汝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rǔ］
［《廣韻》人渚切，上語，日。］
(1)古水名。源出河南省鲁山县大盂山，流经宝丰、襄城、郾城、上蔡、汝南，注入淮河。
(2)古州名。隋大业二年改伊州置，以州境有汝水得名。治所在梁县（今河南省临汝县）。辖境相当于今河南省北汝县、沙河流域各县。
(3)你。多用于称同辈或后辈。
(4)用于表示领属关系。犹言你的；你们的。
(5)谓以“汝”相称。表示彼此亲昵。
(6)指汝窑或汝窑所产瓷器。
(7)姓。汉有汝章。见《後汉书·冯异传》。

汝字的英文翻译

◎ 汝
you

汝字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　汝； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页606第02
【唐韻】人渚切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】忍與切，?音茹。水名。【說文】水出弘農盧氏，還歸山東入淮。【水經】汝水出河南梁縣勉鄕西天息山。【酈道元注】今汝水出魯陽縣之大盂山黃柏谷，至原鹿縣，南入於淮，謂之汝口。側有汝口戍，淮汝之交會也。【春秋釋例】汝水至汝隂褒信縣入淮。【詩·周南】遵彼汝墳。　又州名。【廣韻】春秋時爲王畿及鄭楚之地。左傳，楚襲梁，及霍，漢爲梁縣，後魏屬汝北郡，隋移于陸渾縣北，遂攺爲汝州。【廣輿記】今屬河南州，西有臨汝城古蹟。　又汝寧，郡名。【廣輿記】秦屬潁川，漢曰汝南，元曰汝寧郡，有汝陽縣。　又姓。【書·亡篇】有汝鳩，汝方，湯之賢臣。【左傳】有汝寬。　又【韻會】通作女。【前漢·地理志】女陽，女隂，?與汝同。　又爾女亦作爾汝。【書·益稷】子欲左右，有民汝翼。子欲宣力，四方汝爲。

考證：〔【水經】【酈道元注】今汝水出魯陽縣之大孟山黃柏谷。〕　謹照原文孟改盂。黄改蒙。

：是代词，指你。

Basic explanation of words
Ru
rǔ
You: Ru generation. You wait. Ru Cao. What will you tell me?
name.
Ru
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [rǔ]
["Guangyun" Ren Zhuqie, Shangyu, Japanese. ]
(1) Ancient water name. It originates from Dayu Mountain in Lushan County, Henan Province, flows through Baofeng, Xiangcheng, Licheng, Shangcai, Runan, and flows into the Huai River.
(2) The name of the ancient state. In the second year of Sui Daye, it was changed to Yizhou, named after Rushui in the state border. It was governed in Liang County (now Linru County, Henan Province). The jurisdiction is equivalent to the counties of Beiru County and Shahe River Basin in Henan Province today.
(3) You. Mostly used to refer to peers or younger generations.
(4) It is used to express the affiliation relationship. Still talking about you; yours.
(5) It is said to be suitable for "Ru". Indicates mutual intimacy.
(6) Refers to the porcelain produced in Ru kiln or Ru kiln.
(7) Last name. Han has Ru Zhang. See "Book of the Later Han·Feng Yi Biography".

you
Ru
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　Ru; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: Page 606 02
[Tang Yun] Ren Zhuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Tolerate and cut,? Yinru. Water name. [Said the text] The water left Hongnong Lu's family, and returned to Shandong to enter the Huaihe River. [Water Classic] Rushui flows out of Tianxi Mountain in Mianyang, Liang County, Henan Province. [Li Daoyuan's Note] Today Rushui flows out of the Huangbai Valley of Dayu Mountain in Luyang County, to Yuanlu County, and enters the Huai River in the south, which is called Rukou. There is Rukoushu on the side, and the meeting between Huai and Ru. [Spring and Autumn Interpretation] Rushui to Ruyin Baoxin County enters the Huai River. [Poetry·Zhou Nan] Zun Biru's grave.　Also the name of the state. [Guang Yun] It was the land of Wang Ji and Zheng Chu in the Spring and Autumn Period. Zuo Zhuan, Chu attacked Liang, Jihuo, Han was Liang County, Later Wei Dynasty belonged to Rubei County, Sui moved to the north of Luhun County, and then became Ruzhou. [Guang Yu Ji] It belongs to Henan Province today, and there is the ancient site of Linru City to the west.　 And Runing, the county name. [Guang Yu Ji] Qin belongs to Yingchuan, Han is called Runan, Yuan is called Runing County, and there is Ruyang County.　Another last name. [Book·Death] There are Rujiu, Rufang, and Tang Zhixian. [Zuo Zhuan] There is Ru Kuan.　[Yunhui] Master is a female. [Former Han Geography] Female yang, female yin, same as Ru.　You Er girl is also Erru. 【Book·Yiji】If the child wants to control, there are people and ru wing. If you want to proclaim your strength, you will do everything in all directions. Textual research: [[Shui Jing] [Li Daoyuan's Note] Today Rushui flows out of Huangbai Valley in Dameng Mountain, Luyang County. 〕 　 I would like to follow the original Meng Gaiyu. Huang Gaimeng.

RU
Пиктофонетические символы.
Вода ()) означает, что древние иероглифы подобны реке, что указывает на то, что она связана с рекой; женский символ (ni) выражает звук.
Первоначальное значение относится к Рушуи, который возник в западной части Хэнани.
